titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 558) to provide urgently needed assistance to protect and improve the lives and safety of the homeless, with special emphasis on families and children.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-12.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 274 - 126 (Record Vote No: 18).

bill.summary: 3/4/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 558 (programs for the homeless) and waives points of order against the consideration of such bill.
